Verses: 1 neengal Kiristhuvudankooda Ezhundhadhundaanaal, Kiristhu Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Veetrirukkum Idaththilulla Melaanavaigalaith Thedungal.
2 boomiyilullavaigalaiyalla, Melaanavaigalaiye Naadungal.
3 enendraal, Neengal Mariththeergal, Ungal Jeevan Kiristhuvudane Dhevanukkul Maraindhirukkiradhu.
4 nammudaiya Jeevanaagiya Kiristhu Velippadumpodhu, Neengalum Avarodekooda Magimaiyile Velippaduveergal.
5 aagaiyaal, Vibachaaram, Asuththam, Mogam, Dhurichchai, Vikkiragaaraadhanaiyaana Porulaasai Aagiya Ivaigalaip Boomiyil Undupannugira Ungal Avayavangalai Azhiththuppodungal.
6 ivaigalinporutte Keezhppadiyaamaiyin Pillaigalmel Dhevakobaakkinai Varum.
7 neengalum Murkaalaththil Avargalukkulle Sanjariththapodhu, Avaigalai Seydhukonduvandheergal.
8 ippozhudho Kobamum Moorkkamum Poraamaiyum, Ungal Vaayil Pirakkalaagaadha Dhooshanamum Vambu Vaarththaigalumaagiya Ivaigalaiyellaam Vittuvidungal.
9 oruvarukkoruvar Poi Sollaadhirungal; Pazhaiya Manushanaiyum Avan Seygaigalaiyum Kalaindhupottu,
10 thannai Sirushtiththavarudaiya Saayalukkoppaaip Poorana Arivadaiyumpadi Pudhidhaakkappatta Pudhiya Manushanaith Thariththukkondirukkireergale.

11 adhile Girekkanendrum Yoodhanendrumillai, Viruththasedhanamullavanendrum Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanendrumillai, Purajaadhiyaanendrum Puradhesaththaanendrumillai, Adimaiyendrum Suyaadheenanendrumillai; Kiristhuve Ellaarilum Ellaamumaayirukkiraar.

12 aagaiyaal, Neengal Dhevanaal Therindhukollappatta Parisuththarum Piriyarumaai, Urukkamaana Irakkaththaiyum, Dhayavaiyum, Manaththaazhmaiyaiyum, Saandhaththaiyum, Neediya Porumaiyaiyum Thariththukkondu;
13 oruvaraiyoruvar Thaangi, Oruvarperil Oruvarukkuk Kuraipaadu Undaanaal, Kiristhu Ungalukku Manniththadhupola, Oruvarukkoruvar Manniyungal.
14 ivai Ellaavatrinmelum, Pooranasargunaththin Kattaagiya Anbaith Thariththukkollungal.
15 dhevasamaadhaanam Ungal Irudhayangalil Aalakkadavadhu, Idharkendre Neengal Ore Sareeramaaga Azhaikkappatteergal; Nandriyaridhalullavargalaayumirungal.

16 kiristhuvin Vasanam Ungalukkulle Sagala Gnaanaththodum Paripooranamaaga Vaasamaayiruppadhaaga; Sangeedhangalinaalum Keerththanaigalinaalum Gnaanappaattugalinaalum Oruvarukkoruvar Podhiththu Puththisollikkondu, Ungal Irudhayaththile Karththaraip Bakdhiyudan Paadi;
17 vaarththaiyinaalaavadhu Kiriyaiyinaalaavadhu, Neengal Edhai Seydhaalum, Adhaiyellaam Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaale Seydhu, Avar Munnilaiyaagap Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanai Sthoththiriyungal.
18 manaivigale, Karththarukkerkumpadi, Ungal Purusharukkuk Keezhppadiyungal.
19 purushargale, Ungal Manaivigalil Anbukoorungal, Avargalmel Kasandhu Kollaadhirungal.
20 pillaigale, Ungalaip Petrorukku Ellaak Kaariyaththileyum Keezhppadiyungal; Idhu Karththarukkup Piriyamaanadhu.
21 pidhaakkale, Ungal Pillaigal Thidanatruppogaadhapadi, Avargalukkuk Kobamoottaadhirungal.

22 velaikkaarare, Sareeraththinpadi Ungal Ejamaangalaayirukkiravargalukku Ellaak Kaariyaththileyum Keezhppadindhu, Neengal Manusharukkup Piriyamaayirukka Virumbugiravargalaagap Paarvaikku Oozhiyancheyyaamal, Dhevanukkup Bayappadugiravargalaagak Kabadamillaadha Irudhayaththode Oozhiyancheyyungal.
23 neengal Karththaraagiya Kiristhuvai Sevikkiradhinaale, Sudhandharamaagiya Balanaik Karththaraale Peruveergalendru Arindhu,
24 edhaich Seydhaalum, Adhai Manushargalukkendru Seyyaamal, Karththarukkendre Manappoorvamaai Seyyungal.
25 aniyaayanseygiravan Thaan Seydha Aniyaayaththukketra Balanai Adaivaan; Patchapaadhame Illai.
